name: Gingival Recession Surgery
pitch_points: Scientifically designed, phase-specific protocol that provides antioxidant conditioning before surgery, promotes pain relief and mucosal protection during acute healing, and supports long-term antioxidant balance for optimal tissue appearance and health.

name: Scaling and Root Planing (SRP)
pitch_points: Reduces inflammation and accelerates tissue healing post-procedure.

name: Oral Lichen Planus
pitch_points: Evidence-based management for a challenging condition with limited treatment options.

name: Dry Mouth (Radiation/Chemo/Extreme Sensitivity)

pitch_points: Minimizes post-laser tissue sensitivity and accelerates epithelialization.

pitch_points: Stops progression to periodontitis and reduces inflammation.
